features: Child's Entertainment Whilst Driving: Baby car seat toys with mirrors can be easily installed on car seat headrests, strollers, rocking chairs, cribs, strollers, etc. The car seat toy makes your toddler sit in a forward facing car seat, allowing him to imitate the driver's actions. The toddler is kept occupied and remains happy when in the car while playing with the activity center

Great for Baby's Development: Baby develops imagination and emotional intelligence by imitating the driver’s actions. Rotating the steering wheel and gear lever and pressing the various buttons, help develop baby’s motor skills. Adjustable rings for babies of different ages and usage scenarios

Car Steering Wheel Imitation: The toy includes clicking steering wheel, ratcheting gear lever that helps your child to imitate driver’s actions. While child enjoys playing with a toy he can see himself in the mirror, which can entertain the baby while the parents are driving. Parents no longer have to worry about their baby crying, as they have an interesting toy on the road

Made of Premium Materials: With interactive buttons and sounds, this car wheel toy encourages learning, exploration and imaginative play while baby is on the go. The toy has Eco-friendly material, yet is durable and resilient to last a long time. Non-toxic paint on each piece allows baby to learn and play in safety

100% Hassle-free Guarantee: Requires 3 X AA batteries (not included). The car seat toys have a steering wheel and a ratchet gear lever, a baby safety mirror, 3 sounds and lights, horns and music, and engine ignition. If you have any question, please feel free to contact us via Amazon Messages or question on the page. We will do our best to give you satisfactory service

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COVTOY Baby Car Seat Toys for Infants with Mirror ​Are you worried that your baby will cry and get bored when you are traveling, doing chores, or going shopping?COVTOY baby car seat toys can help you address your concerns!While you are driving, a baby can enjoy imitating the driver's movements in the safety seat and enjoy a wonderful journey together.Whether you go out or need to do something independently, the car seat play center toy can temporarily help you free your hands.Baby car seat toys are the best gifts for babies and parents！

Carseat Toys Steering Wheel with Music Lights and Driving Sounds Development Toys Made from colorful, soft, skin-friendly fabrics that babies can play with without fear of coming into contact with toys that could harm them. Requires 3 X AA Batteries ​Toys for babies 0-12 months, baby car seat toys with adjustable clasps and mirrors are easy to attract a baby's attention and make good newborn toys. Develop Imagination Ability ​The musical toy features a steering wheel, gear shift, turn signal, ignition key, horn button and baby-safe mirror to help baby explore as they grow. Easy & Safe Assembly The musical wheel car toy attaches easily to the headrest of the seat in front by means of two plastic rings.

Can the straps reach the driver and passenger headrests simultaneously for center seated car seats? The straps is adjustable, it can move to the center seated car seats. Can you use this for a rear facing car seat? Yes, it is work for a rear facing car seat. How is the quality of this product? The product has high quality, you don't need to worry about our car seat toys being damaged in a short time, baby likes it very much. I want to know does this toy really work? This is a good deal, this product has many toy features, it keeps my kids from crying and fussing in the car, a good trip every time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love that it keeps my niece happy when we’re in the car.
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great entertainment for my niece

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My toddler loves this for car rides!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Unsafe screw on back
reviews.reviewText: Other than one defect, we love this product, but it’s an important one. The screw that is supposed to hold the cover on the battery compartment does not have anything to secure it in place. The hole the screw is supposed to go into is just a plain hole with no threads, which means the battery cover comes off with little to no effort. This is unsafe for a baby/toddler to play with, especially in the back seat (possibly out of view and reach of an adult) as intended. We put some heavy duty packing tape over the compartment as a quick fix.If this was fixed, the product would be 5/5 stars, easily. My son LOVES it and it is a lifesaver on long car rides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have that I wish I found sooner.
reviews.reviewText: Of course I found this on our third and last kiddo. It has been an absolute gem to have in the car. The noises aren’t annoying at all. It keeps our one year old entertained. We took a 3 day drive over 9 states and this absolutely saved our (and his) sanity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dont Put in Batteries
reviews.reviewText: Forget the bells & whistles, this toy is great as a simple mechanical toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a classic example of overpaying on Amazon…especially with Prime. This toy is super basic and not at all worth what we paid. Keeping it because our kiddo showed some interest in it in the car. I would also say until your kiddo can sit up on their own/has good hand eye coordination, this isn’t the toy for them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after a couple of weeks.
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this toy for car rides. After a couple weeks of use and a couple of longer car rides it stopped working. The noises stopped all together. We tried switching the batteries and that was not the issue. I am very disappointed.
